sale.description:
Artsy presents **Rago Auctions: 19th/20th C. American/European Art,** featuring works by Pablo Picasso, Marc Chagall, Joan Mir√≥, and more. In advance of the auction, browse lots and place max bids before live bidding begins on **May 6th at 10:00am ET.**

When the sale opens, all pre-registered Artsy users can participate and watch the bidding unfold in real time. Registration for the live auction will close on **May 5th at 10:00am ET.**
sale.name: Rago Auctions: 19th/20th C. American/European Art
